page.title: 15Wynfield Plants Ltd.
page.content: Wynfield Plants Farm is at Rigby's Farm (G.R.0347204107)- started in October 1983 & has 26 acres. 1.5. acres of this is{greenhouses.}They sell over 500 different varieties & 200,000 plants a year to wholesale and retail shops. Their nearest customer is Clayton's fruit farm, Newburgh and the furthest away is in France. Plants are started from {cuttings imported from New Zealand,Holland and Canada.}The soil that they use is made out of sand,peat and fertilisers obtained from Stoke-on- Trent. They have 3 tractors and spraying machines. They {employ 11 workers}and in June they have extra help. A day's work starts at 8.00-4.30 pm, but Mr Staples stays till 5/00pm.
